page.title: 03 Farming-Effects-Boars Hill
page.content: Farming is the dominant feature of the Boars Hill area. A certain amount of concern is expressed about the side effects of various sprays and chemicals which are used by farmers. What effects will these have on wild life?..On rivers and streams? What will be the long term effect on the land? Constant research is taking place to assess the likely results of modern intensive farming. Many hedgerows have been destroyed in order to make more land available for farming. What effect will this have on wild life? Is it likely to produce soil erosion in the future? Many people are worried about these questions.
